name: nrgabv
params: class c0, class c1, class c2

stmt.origin: simprbi(wcel(c0, cnrg), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c0, cngp))
stmt.pretty: simprbi(c0 ∈ NrmRing, c1 ∈ c2, c0 ∈ NrmGrp)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cnrg), wcel(c1, c2))
-| wb(wcel(c0, cnrg), wa(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, c2)))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ NrmRing → c1 ∈ c2)
⊣ (c0 ∈ NrmRing ↔(c0 ∈ NrmGrp ∧ c1 ∈ c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cnrg), wcel(c1, c2))
-| wb(wcel(c0, cnrg), wa(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, c2)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ NrmRing → c1 ∈ c2)
⊣ (c0 ∈ NrmRing ↔(c0 ∈ NrmGrp ∧ c1 ∈ c2))

body.origin:
|- wb(wcel(c0, cnrg), wa(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c1, c2)))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cnm, c0))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cabv, c0))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ NrmRing ↔(c0 ∈ NrmGrp ∧ c1 ∈ c2))
⊣ c1 =(norm ` c0)
⊣ c2 =(AbsVal ` c0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cnrg), wcel(c1, c2))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cnm, c0))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cabv, c0))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ NrmRing → c1 ∈ c2)
⊣ c1 =(norm ` c0)
⊣ c2 =(AbsVal ` c0)

comment: The norm of a normed ring is an absolute value. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Oct-2015.)
